section.title: NetworkManager
section.para: NetworkManager is controlled using either nmcli or nmtui (curses-based terminal user interface). See their manual pages for details on their usage. Some desktop environments (GNOME, KDE) have their own configuration tools for NetworkManager.

note.para: networking.networkmanager and networking.wireless (WPA Supplicant) cannot be enabled at the same time: you can still connect to the wireless networks using NetworkManager.
